Articles.Content:
Hey guys,

perhaps a silly question, but Im updating my IVA mod, and when loading up Unity using a 1.0.2 directory path, and spawning an squad internal none of the prop textures are loading - now I know that the textures were converted to dds - so I may be missing something to make Unity load dds textures - any suggestions?

Much appreciated.

KSP PartTools cannot load DDS textures, because DDS is based on the proprietary S3 Texture Compression algorithm, and SQUAD isn't able to redistribute the associated codecs.

You'll need to convert those DDS textures to PNG first (and flip them vertically) using a third-party tool before PartTools can recognize them.

Edited May 18, 2015 by sumghai
